Dorothy Akpene Amenuke bụ onye Ghana Sculptor / fiber Artist na Lecturer
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi ugbu a na Ngalaba eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ na ngalaba nke Fine Art, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST).
A mụrụ Amenuke n'afọ 1968 ma si Adzokoe-Peki, na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana. Ọ gụrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Mahadum Kwame Nkrumah nke Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ nke Ghana (KNUST) dị ka onye na-agụ akwụkwọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na KNUST maka MA ya na Art Education, MFA na Sculpture, na PhD na Sculpture.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi nka na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na nke sekọndrị site n'afọ 1987 ruo n'afọ 2004. Ọrụ Amenuke dị na nchịkọta nke Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam.
